trans-unit.source: Provides the stack functionality for a stack of server channel sinks.
trans-unit.target: 提供的服务器通道堆栈的堆栈功能接收器。

trans-unit.source: Pops the information associated with all the sinks from the sink stack up to and including the specified sink.
trans-unit.target: 弹出达与从接收器堆栈的所有接收器关联和包括指定的接收器的信息。

trans-unit.source: The sink to remove and return from the sink stack.
trans-unit.target: 若要移除并返回从接收器堆栈接收器。

trans-unit.source: Information generated on the request side and associated with the specified sink.
trans-unit.target: 请求端上生成并与指定的接收器相关联的信息。

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方没有基础结构权限。

trans-unit.source: Pushes the specified sink and information associated with it onto the sink stack.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的接收器和与它关联到接收器堆栈信息的推送。

trans-unit.source: The information generated on the request side and specified in the `state` parameter is returned in the `state` parameter of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSink.AsyncProcessResponse%2A> method on the corresponding sink.
trans-unit.target: 信息请求端上生成并中指定`state`参数中返回`state`参数<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSink.AsyncProcessResponse%2A>相应接收器上的方法。</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSink.AsyncProcessResponse%2A>

trans-unit.source: The sink to push onto the sink stack.
trans-unit.target: 要推送到接收器堆栈接收器。

trans-unit.source: Information generated on the request side that is needed on the response side.
trans-unit.target: 在响应端需要的请求端上生成的信息。

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方没有基础结构权限。

trans-unit.source: Presents a callback delegate to handle a callback after a message has been dispatched asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于在异步调度消息回调的回调委托。

trans-unit.source: The dispatched message represents a request method call on a remote object.
trans-unit.target: 调度的消息表示远程对象上的请求方法调用。

trans-unit.source: The ServerCallback method is intended for use only by the .NET Framework remoting infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: ServerCallback 方法适合仅由.NET Framework 远程处理基础结构使用。

trans-unit.source: The status and state of an asynchronous operation on a remote object.
trans-unit.target: 状态和对远程对象的异步操作的状态。

trans-unit.source: Stores a message sink and its associated state for later asynchronous processing.
trans-unit.target: 存储消息接收器和更高版本的异步处理其关联的状态。

trans-unit.source: The Store method is intended for use only by the .NET Framework remoting infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 应用商店方法适合仅由.NET Framework 远程处理基础结构使用。

trans-unit.source: A server channel sink.
trans-unit.target: 服务器信道接收器。

trans-unit.source: The state associated with `sink`.
trans-unit.target: 与关联的状态`sink`。

trans-unit.source: Stores a message sink and its associated state, and then dispatches a message asynchronously, using the sink just stored and any other stored sinks.
trans-unit.target: 存储消息接收器和其关联的状态，并且随后将调度消息以异步方式，使用刚刚存储的接收器和任何其他存储的接收器。

trans-unit.source: The StoreAndDispatch method is intended for use only by the .NET Framework remoting infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: StoreAndDispatch 方法适合仅由.NET Framework 远程处理基础结构使用。

trans-unit.source: Also, the method should only be called by a transport sink to complete an asynchronous dispatch.
trans-unit.target: 此外，仅应由传输接收器以完成异步调度调用方法。

trans-unit.source: A server channel sink.
trans-unit.target: 服务器信道接收器。

trans-unit.source: The state associated with `sink`.
trans-unit.target: 与关联的状态`sink`。
